txt.en:
The assault against the upper gate-house has been unsuccessful for Saruman's armies. The small window openings only allow for small hooks and grapnels without space for attaching a ladder. The goblins have devised a plan to construct winches within the window openings for them to raise ladders; ladders which will allow for their brutal Uruk-hai companions to aid them in the slaughter.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Moderate Merit Gain</rgb>
* Constructed pulley destroyed

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Injured Rohirrim defeated
* Rohirrim healer defeated

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Pulley constructed
* Ladder raised

The goblins must not be allowed to construct any winches in the gate-house windows, or the army will be able to raise ladders for fast entry. The wounded Rohirrim that have retreated to within the walls will be easy targets once the enemy has secured an entry point.
Do not allow healers and wounded Rohirrm to be defeated ([placeholder]/6)
A Rohirrim healer has been defeated
A wounded Rohirrim has been defeated
